headline: Citizens Financial (CFG) Draws Upgrades as Fee Growth Boosts Outlook
summary: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE:CFG) is one of the best bank stocks to buy trading under book value. Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE:CFG) is attracting renewed optimism from Wall Street after Citi raised its price target to $60 from $57 on July 21, while maintaining a Buy rating. With shares currently trading around $49.20, that implies […]
